attributes.action: Stop GP s using e consultations
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous cases now ( covered in Daily Mail ) of people dying , serious illnesses not being detected , miss use of antibiotics to treat anything and lack of privacy when having to take calls from GP s in the street because if you miss the call you are lucky to get a second without going through process again. Dentists , shop assistant , nurses care workers are all in front line , where are our GPs.
attributes.background: It is now impossible to get face to face appointments to see your GP. It does not matter what you put on the e consult form , you will never get an appointment to see GP or get mail back to say GP will call within 5 days or dial 111
